attributes.action: Protection for our babies final resting place.
attributes.additional_details: Our local council won’t accept that any damage is being done. When they are not the ones finding stuff damaged and cleaning it up. The can’t “investigate” as there’s not cameras or any security in that part. We want to be listened to and have our babies gardens secured.
attributes.background: Let us parents/Carers of our angel babies have some sort of security for our babies resting places. To stop youths and vandals in terrorising our babies gardens.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your experience, but taking action in relation to vandalism of a cemetery would be a matter for the police and your local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
